### Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
#### Subject Matter Expert Services related to Illicit/Illegal Drugs in Canada

**Solicitation Number:** 202305116
**Contracting Authority:** Chantale Gregoire
**Telephone Number:** 343-549-5220
**Email Address:** contracting@ps-sp.gc.ca

**Date:** March 9, 2023

**Closing Date:** March 23, 2023

**Description of Requirement:**

Public Safety Canada invites the participation of qualified contractors to provide subject matter expert services related to illicit/illegal drugs in Canada. The services include specialized knowledge development, mobilization, and dissemination.

**Period of Work:**

* The contract period will run from contract award to March 31, 2025.
* Optional services can be acquired by the Contracting Authority for two (2) optional one year periods.

**Security Requirements:**

No security requirements are applicable to this solicitation.

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**

The Government of Canada has a requirement for a contractor to conduct specialized knowledge development, mobilization, and dissemination activities in relation to illicit drugs and their public safety implications.

**Contact Information:**

For more information or to express interest in the solicitation, please contact:

Chantale Gregoire
343-549-5220
contracting@ps-sp.gc.ca

**Documents**

The following document(s) are attached to this notice:

* English: [Link to the Attachment](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/09/d3d6658fbefd60701c5d7b4baedc08ff/acan_-_202305116_-_subject_matter_expert_services_related_to_illicitillegal_drugs_in_canada.pdf)
* French: [Lien pour pièce jointe](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/09/ca3fce1428f9e58cc78870c364fb03ad/acan_-_202305116_-_services_dexperts_en_la_matiere_lies_aux_drogues_illicitesillegales_au_canada.pdf)

**Solicitation Information**

The solicitation is open to vendors who meet the requirements specified in the Notice of Proposed Procurement. Interested vendors are invited to submit their proposals by the closing date.

**Note**

Please be aware that the Government of Canada is unable to provide extensions to the closing date
